Gisborne dog attacks leave more than fifty animals dead https://www.nzherald.co.nz https://www.nzherald.co.nz'There were bits of chicken down Nelson Rd.' Thu, 03 Oct 2024 22:10:17 +0000 A group of escaped unregistered dogs in Gisborne have been caught and put down after they killed 24 Muscovy ducks, 10 chickens, 16 lambs and three ewes on nearby properties in a single night.
Government pinches KiwiBuild idea National dubbed ‘financial black hole’ to save property developers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/government-pinches-kiwibuild-idea-national-dubbed-financial-black-hole-to-save-property-developers/M5W3UTS63ZCX3FMYK2NUCEBMQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/government-pinches-kiwibuild-idea-national-dubbed-financial-black-hole-to-save-property-developers/M5W3UTS63ZCX3FMYK2NUCEBMQ4/ Thomas CoughlanThe Government will underwrite developers in a scheme for which it criticised Labour. Thu, 03 Oct 2024 22:05:39 +0000 Housing Minister Chris Bishop (second right) says the Government will underwrite developers in an effort to boost the housing supply. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
More under-5s ending up in hospital on hot days, creating lifelong health risks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/more-under-5s-ending-up-in-hospital-on-hot-days-creating-lifelong-health-risks/7GZ23XEMRNFIZPBHDNNHD7ULSM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/more-under-5s-ending-up-in-hospital-on-hot-days-creating-lifelong-health-risks/7GZ23XEMRNFIZPBHDNNHD7ULSM/ More young children needed hospital care when temperatures topped 24.1C Thu, 03 Oct 2024 22:05:26 +0000 Medical researcher Dr Hakkan Lai says young children are more affected by heat than adults. Photo: Supplied / Auckland Council
Banking Ombudsman refuses compensation for $250k scam victim, despite ASB manager helping transfer money to thieves https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banking-ombudsman-refuses-compensation-for-250k-scam-victim-despite-asb-manager-helping-transfer-money-to-thieves/OUX6JADBLBAYTE5ISQV7XS2734/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banking-ombudsman-refuses-compensation-for-250k-scam-victim-despite-asb-manager-helping-transfer-money-to-thieves/OUX6JADBLBAYTE5ISQV7XS2734/ Lane NicholsIf the victim had lost the money in Britain, he would likely have received a full refund. Thu, 03 Oct 2024 22:05:13 +0000 A Defence Force officer lost $250,000 in a banking scam after an ASB manager helped him transfer his life savings to the thieves. But the Banking Ombudsman has declined to award compensation. Photo / NZME

Whanganui’s Fitzgerald brothers dominate Totalspan building awards https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/whanganuis-fitzgerald-brothers-dominate-totalspan-building-awardss/YOW4YPJOMVBUNLGHFO4CBYKM7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/whanganuis-fitzgerald-brothers-dominate-totalspan-building-awardss/YOW4YPJOMVBUNLGHFO4CBYKM7Y/ Steve CarleWhanganui's Fitzgerald brothers dominate Totalspan building awards Thu, 03 Oct 2024 21:46:51 +0000 The Fitzgerald brothers Aiden and Michael, owners-operators of Fitzgerald Steel Buildings Ltd and trading as Totalspan Whanganui/Hawera, took the prestigious Franchise of the Year Award at the Totalspan awards evening.
